name: test_charm
description:
arrange: deploy two ubuntu units and two wireguard-gateway applications.
    act: integrate the two wireguard-gateway applications.
    assert: wait for all units to be active.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: deploy two ubuntu units and two wireguard-gateway applications.
act: integrate the two wireguard-gateway applications.
assert: wait for all units to be active.

testStage.description:
arrange: deploy two ubuntu units and two wireguard-gateway applications.
    act: integrate the two wireguard-gateway applications.
    assert: wait for all units to be active.
